m:MaterialTitle.title: Introduction
m:MaterialTitle.description: A list that doesn’t contain any items, or a search that doesn’t display any results, are examples of empty states. Although these states aren’t typical, they should be designed to prevent user confusion.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Icons, Title and Description
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily update each icon, title and description of the emptystate.

ma:emptystate.MaterialEmptyState.title: Get Started
ma:emptystate.MaterialEmptyState.description: Find a great movie in the Play Store, then relax and enjoy with the Play Movies and TV app.
